name: set_origin
example_comment: The above snippet sets the origin of the <%= doc_class_name  %> to 50 pixels to the left, and 100 pixels down.
description: Assigns a new **origin** for the <%= doc_class_name  %> (default `[0, 0]`).

parameters.name: x
